summary.name: AMC Theaters
summary.description: AMC (short for American Multi-Cinema) is the number one movie theatre company within the industry boasting 620 locations thorughout the U.S. and almost 8,000 screens within them.

overview.name: AMC Headquarters
overview.description: AMC HQ is home to the offices of the many high up employees for the company including the CEO, CFO, etc. Here is where the ins and outs of the business gets handled including tasks such as renting the rights to films, meeting with production companies, and overall management roles.

location.address: One AMC Way, 11500 Ash Street, Leawood, KS 66211

overview.name: AMC Empire 25 Theatre
overview.description: The Empire 25 was built in 1912 originally as a performance theatre and it still has the same exterior from when it started. In 1942 it was converted to a movie theatre and has five levels of theatres.

overview.name: Universal Cinema AMC at CityWalk Hollywood
overview.description: This theatre location is right in the middle of Universal Studios and offers a unique experience for people that would like to learn mpre about the production of movies while then being able to go right over and watch the fully made film after in such close proximity.

location.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608

overview.name: AMC Liberty Tree Mall
overview.description: This theatre is located about 30 minutes north of Boston (and 20 minutes away from me- Joe Dever) inside a shopping mall. The theatre is one of the only reasons the mall is still surviving because it is the main reason why most people go there.

sources.source: Myself mostly just becasue ive been here a lot

overview.name: AMC Dine-In at Framingham
overview.description: At this AMC location guests are offered a full menu and bar as well as luxury recliner seating. This "Dine-In" aspect is relatively new for the AMC franchise. Guests can order food and drink from the bar in person or on an app that they can download and then eat and drink their orders in the theatre while watching the performance.
